violations_detected.title: Long information search
violations_detected.evidence: Customer asked which disc fits her Renault Sandero (Stepway 2016). Operator announced search at 3:03s ('Сейчас я посмотрю по параметрам'). Search completed with answer at 4:04s ('Параметры совпадают'). Total search duration: 61.82 seconds, exceeds 45-second threshold.

violations_detected.title: No thank you for waiting
violations_detected.evidence: After long 61.82s search completed at 4:04.980s with 'Параметры совпадают', operator immediately began technical explanation of parameters without expressing gratitude for customer's patience. No 'спасибо за ожидание' or similar phrase found within 5 seconds after search completion.

coaching_priorities.recommendation: When database lookups exceed 40 seconds, inform customer of expected wait time. Aim to complete complex vehicle parameter searches within 40-45 second window maximum. Consider preparing common vehicle specs in advance.

Always thank customer for their patience after any search completion, even when delivering technical information. Use phrases like 'Спасибо за ожидание' or 'Благодарю за терпение' immediately after returning with search results.

1.1.evidence: No profanity, harsh language, or rudeness detected throughout 9.5 minute call

2.1.evidence: Call completed successfully, full service provided, no dropout or refusal

3.1.evidence: Customer request fully resolved: order placed with number 968076 for discs and tires, specifications confirmed, pricing provided

3.3.evidence: No confidential information disclosed. Order number shared appropriately for customer reference.

3.6.evidence: Operator verified information through database lookups: checked vehicle parameters, checked availability, checked compatibility. No 'from memory' information provided.

4.1.evidence: Customer asked many questions; operator handled professionally without frustration or tone decline. Adapted to customer's needs and repeated reassurances about product fit.

5.1.evidence: All mandatory information provided: product specifications (Nimba discs 2990, total cost 34240), delivery location (Krasnoufimsk pickup point), payment terms (2000 advance + balance on delivery), order number (968076), follow-up process (manager call next day)

6.1.evidence: No critical silences >45s without customer hangup. Call terminated normally by both parties.
6.1.note: Note: One search reached 61.82s but this is captured under 9.1

7.1.evidence: Greeting includes company name (74 колеса), operator name (Анна), offer to help. Closing includes thanks and farewell. Information delivery follows logical sequence.

7.2.evidence: No contact data (name, phone, address, email) was collected during this call. Customer was already identified and had existing order context.

7.3.evidence: Intro: First operator speech at 1.139s (well within 5s threshold). Disconnect: Last speech at 568.172s with immediate call end (0s delay, within 5s threshold).

7.4.evidence: No interruptions without apology detected. Operator waits for customer responses and does not cut off mid-sentence.

9.1.evidence: Search from 3:03.160s to 4:04.980s = 61.82 seconds exceeds 45-second threshold. Announced at 3:03s ('Сейчас я посмотрю по параметрам'), completed at 4:04s ('Параметры совпадают')

9.3.evidence: After 61.82s search completed at 4:04.980s, no gratitude expressed within 5 seconds. Operator proceeded directly to technical explanation without 'спасибо за ожидание' or similar.

10.2.evidence: Information provided per script: greeting, product inquiry, detailed specifications, pricing, delivery options, payment terms, closing. Logical flow and professional presentation.

10.3.evidence: Professional, friendly tone throughout. Builds rapport through reassurance about product fit ('Они подойдут по размерам', repeated confirmations). Maintains conversation control with logical question sequence.
10.3.note: Customer name not explicitly used in callbacks, but overall dialogue management excellent

10.6.evidence: Complete and accurate product information: disc types, specifications, pricing, compatibility verification, delivery logistics, payment options. Confident command of technical parameters.

positive_observations: Excellent product knowledge: Operator confidently discussed multiple disc options, technical specifications (ET offset, diameter, bolt pattern), and compatibility
Professional information search: Multiple database lookups performed to verify vehicle parameters and product compatibility
Thorough specification verification: Checked wheel size, engine size, bolt pattern, hub diameter against customer vehicle model
Customer reassurance: Repeatedly confirmed products would fit customer's vehicle to address her concerns
Complete order resolution: Successfully created order with all details (vehicle specs, product selection, pricing, delivery method)
Clear pricing communication: Provided itemized costs (tires 22,280 + discs 11,960 = 34,240 total, with payment plan options)
Professional closing: Polite farewell with thanks and next-step explanation (manager callback for confirmation)
Logical conversation flow: Structured progression from greeting through product inquiry, specifications, options, pricing, delivery, and closing

data_quality.confidence_notes: Word-level timestamps enable precise search duration measurement. VTT timestamps confirm timing patterns. Call structure clear with good speaker diarization.
